Name: Mads
Review Text: Super cocktail bar, great atmosphere, high level of service. I will definitely come back there.

Name: Mads
Review Text: Nice interior, lots of style

Name: Mads
Review Text: Cozy and friendly service, yummy food and very dog-friendly! We loved the kimchi-cheese croquettes especially, and on a quiet Monday night, there were 2 other dogs (with their owners) in addition with our dog.

Name: Mads
Review Text:
Cozy environment, great for hanging out with friends.
Service is a little slow as it was crowded during dinner, but polite and friendly waiter. ‚Ä¶

Name: Mads
Review Text: At the end of tram line 3 there is a lovely cafe without the apple laptop people. There is a lovely chatty but dominant waiter that gladly service your needs. The music is not too loud either. ‚Ä¶

Name: Mads
Review Text: One of the best vegetarian burger I had. The service was excellent. Some lovely ladies making sure we have a very good experience. My family loved the food as well, especially the kapsalon. Thank you again!

Name: Mads
Review Text: Excellent service - food was fab - visited just after Christmas so by the waiters own admission they were short on supply but the chicken and bacon "sandwich" was excellent. Came on a single slice of really thick bread, so not a sandwich, ‚Ä¶

Name: Mads
Review Text: Great food, beer, service and atmosphere. We sat outside and enjoyed the patio. There is a cute park across the way where the kids enjoyed playing and we could see them from our chairs.

Name: Mads
Review Text: Thank you, nice espresso and very friendly. We won‚Äôt forget you! BG from Hamburg (Germany)

Name: Mads
Review Text: A beautiful cafe we visited after doing our first boating trip in the beautiful canals of Amsterdam. ‚Ä¶

Name: Mads
Review Text: Friendly staff, cozy atmosphere and great opening hours.

Name: Mads
Review Text: Probably best kapsalon you will ever try. It's meat free tho. Cocktails are wonderful as well.

Name: Mads
Review Text: Excellent service!! Lovely place!!! Loved it. Very nice music! Thank you. I recommend this place!

Name: Mads
Review Text: Delicious food, amazing service and good prices make this place my favorite one in Amsterdam, I definiately advise everyone to visit it at least once ‚ò∫Ô∏è

Name: Mads
Review Text: Tasty carrot cake, good cappuccino. Service was not up to par.

Name: Mads
Review Text: Very nice family friendly place..Me and my family really enjoyed..thanks I love my chicken sandwich..

Name: Mads
Review Text: The burger and fries were fantastic, make sure you ask for a side of the truffle mayo.

Name: Mads
Review Text: Very friendly staff and great food. And also great beer.

Name: Mads
Review Text:
Amazingly cute location, great staff!!
Really getting the vibe of a real Amsterdam Bar without the crowd of tourists!

Name: Mads
Review Text: The cafe was friendly for our toddler (19months) with high chair and a comfortable dinner environment to relax after a day of sight seeing. We saw lots of locals coming in and out hangout with friends. Food was great. We liked the burger ‚Ä¶

Name: Mads
Review Text: Real chill place, really welcoming people work there. We eat a really good breakfast.

Name: Mads
Review Text: When you are ready for it in life‚Ä¶.. the kapsalon will come to you. Best dish you will find in the neighborhood

Name: Mads
Review Text: Excellent breakfast/ brunch offerings

Name: Mads
Review Text: Used to live almost beside this place and loved it. The service is impeccable and the atmosphere is vibrant. If the sun is out, and you'd want a great view with not too many people go here.

Name: Mads
Review Text: Nice place for a drink, good beers plenty of choice. Interesting menu and good service. Recommend

Name: Mads
Review Text: Nice and cosy bar, good food en reasonable priced for it's central location. Great atmosphere and popular hang out for people from the neighbourhood. Definitely worth a visit when you're around.

Name: Mads
Review Text: Great style, nice music. :)

Name: Mads
Review Text: Cosy non-hipster bar in a quiet part of the center of Amsterdam. I‚Äôve only eaten breakfast here: fluffy pancakes, croissants, fried eggs or a combination of everything. Reasonable prices bordering cheap. Good for a quiet weekend breakfast with newspapers and slow piano music.

Name: Mads
Review Text: Very friendly local cafe. They serve the best chicken and bacon (kip&bacon) sandwich. Staff are friendly and prices are reasonable. I would advise against ordering the pizza!

Name: Mads
Review Text:
Just nipped in here for a bite to eat with my family before whilst we wait for out taxi to the airport.
Excellent coffees & toasted sandwiches. The chap that owns the bar was lovely & friendly.

Name: Mads
Review Text: Nice burgers & cheap! Service a bit slow, but very nice staff. Best terrace you can get for a long sunny afternoon.

Name: Mads
Review Text: Food wasn't very good, especially for the price. Service was poor. I was brought the wrong food, but we had waited so long for out that I said it was fine. It tasted like pasta sauce from a jar. The only reason it got 2 stars instead of 1 was for the bitterballen.

Name: Mads
Review Text: just a capuccino, too small  & weak for my taste.. ;), but a cookie included!! nice terrace outside

Name: Mads
Review Text: A lovely place. Quiet, nice people, no crowds or tourists, friendly staff, and a tasty menue with reasonably priced dishes that never disappoint.

Name: Mads
Review Text: If you can have a seat on the sofa, that would be great. The atmosphere was quit nice, but the service was a bit to slow and informal.

Name: Mads
Review Text: Nice place, but very slow and bad service. Especially on a sunny day, you have to wait very long to get served.

Name: Mads
Review Text: Good beer, food, hospitality. A perfect place for brunch.

Name: Mads
Review Text: Friendly cafe, nice food run by a cheeky but friendly owner who relates well to his customers. Food is good and good value for money.

Name: Mads
Review Text: Nice and calm spot, with a great terrace for the sunny days. Friendly atmosphere and staff, and fair prices for beers and fingerfood.

Name: Mads
Review Text: Great food and service. Fine location too with indoor and outdoor seating.
